methods.name: getAuxLightManager
methods.description: Get the AuxiliaryLightManager of the chunk containing the given BlockPos . The light manager must be used to hold light values controlled by dynamic data from BlockEntity s to ensure access to the light data is thread-safe and the data is available during chunk load from disk where BlockEntity s are not yet added to the chunk.

methods.name: getAuxLightManager
methods.description: Get the AuxiliaryLightManager of the chunk at the given ChunkPos . The light manager must be used to hold light values controlled by dynamic data from BlockEntity s to ensure access to the light data is thread-safe and the data is available during chunk load from disk where BlockEntity s are not yet added to the chunk.

methods.name: getModelData
methods.description: Retrieves model data for a block at the given position.
